messages.title: Theresa May is Backing Duncan Crute
messages.content: Duncan Crute is standing with me to secure strong and stable leadership for our country, and the best Brexit deal possible for you and your constituency of Newcastle North.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Building more affordable homes and investing in schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give everyone a chance to get on in life.
To grow the economy and bring jobs to this part of Newcastle.
Cut immigration to the tens of thousands through a system that works for our communities.

mentions.candidate: I am the only viable candidate... Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate cannot block the referendum result in Parliament and force us to remain in the EU.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race in Newcastle North. The Conservatives came 2nd to Labour at the last election... Only the Conservatives can stop Jeremy Corbyn and the Labour Party in Newcastle.

issues.brexitEurope: I am the only viable candidate committed to respecting the result of the EU referendum.
issues.economy: Working with businesses to grow the economy and bring jobs to this part of Newcastle.
issues.education: Building more affordable homes and investing in schools to give everyone a chance to get on in life.
issues.immigration: Taking control of our borders so we can cut immigration to the tens of thousands through a system that works for our communities.

community.content: Cut immigration to the tens of thousands through a system that works for our communities.

contactInformation.address: 2 Horton Park, Newcastle upon Tyne, NE3 1DQ

endorsements.endorsement: Duncan will be a strong voice for your community in my Government, and together we will always stand up for you and your interests.

images.caption: Duncan Crute standing with Theresa May in Newcastle North

examples: Only the Conservatives can stop Jeremy Corbyn and the Labour Party in Newcastle.
Duncan will be a strong voice for your community in my Government, and together we will always stand up for you and your interests.
I am the only viable candidate committed to respecting the result of the EU referendum.
Lib Dems were a distant fourth place in Newcastle in 2015 and had just 8 MPs elected to Parliament.
Working with businesses to grow the economy and bring jobs to this part of Newcastle.
